snippet.title: Swift Animations: Custom Counting Label - CADisplayLink
snippet.description:
Creating your own animations is quite easy and simple using CADisplayLink once you understand what it does.  In today's lesson I'll teach you how to hook into the refresh rate of your display and execute some UI updating code.  In the end, we'll look at how to integrate animation duration to make it that much better. Enjoy.
